title: Angelina Jolie gifted Maleficent star Elle Fanning diamond ring
text:
The pair have become close friends (Picture: WireImage)

Angelina Jolie is officially the best co-star in the world, after she gifted Elle Fanning a vintage diamond ring when Maleficent wrapped filming.

That’s the only criteria, we’ve decided.

The actress, who recently looked to be having a blast as she celebrated the premiere with her kids, gave her younger co-star a three-stone Cartier piece to remind her of her character Aurora’s wedding.

It’s incredibly extra but we’re so jealous.

‘Maybe [Angelina] thought I’d be too sad to hand back the prop bling?’ Elle considered.

Angelina is reprising her role (Picture: PA)

Despite the pair clearly becoming close friends, the 21-year-old admitted she was ‘so nervous’ about meeting the renowned actress ahead of the movie.

‘I was so young and so nervous. [When I saw her for the first time], she was with her eldest son and I just bear-hugged her and tried to break the ice in that way,’ she recalled.

Yeah we can’t blame her on that one.

However, the star went on to add to Tatler: ‘Our conversations were much more grown up. I felt safer in my own skin to ask questions.’

The second installment of the Maleficent series, which will see Angelina return as the villainous fairy, picks up years after the original, following Aurora getting engaged.

The trailer opens with Aurora’s engagement, the woman previously cursed by the horned fairy to prick her finger on her 16th birthday and never awaken from the deep sleep that ensued – unless she receives true loves first kiss.

Maleficent, due to her motherly love of the kid, woke her and in the sequel we see her fight the pull between her love of Aurora and underlying hate for literally everything else.

However, despite pulling off the cool queen like no one else could, Angelina recently revealed to Metro.co.uk that her costume is a bit of an occupational hazard.

‘It just feels…familiar. I think the first time I felt so strange being her, I was always knocking into my trailer door with the horns and everything,’ Angelina laughed.

They definitely look like they could take an eye out.
